Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P3 (Val-rich; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; bacteriocin, bacteria, prokaryotes; UCLL1a)

Literature.Author: Songnaka N, Lertcanawanichakul M, Hutapea AM, Krobthong S, Yingchutrakul Y, Atipairin A. 2022
Literature.Title: Purification and Characterization of Novel Anti-MRSA Peptides Produced by Brevibacillus sp. SPR-20.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (78.57%) toP2V=L: 29%, K: 21%. GRAVY: 1.07; M Wt: 1586.029; Mol formula: C77H137N17O17; Mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against S. aureus TISTR 517 (MIC 4 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 142 (MIC 4 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 1096 (MIC 4 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 2468 (MIC 4 ug/ml).
